bgDescription: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.
description: Instantly revives a designated Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Instantly revives a designated Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
